name: Business Intelligence Agent
description: An agent that analyzes business performance, tracks key metrics, and provides executive insights for data-driven decision making.

skills.name: Analyze Revenue Trends
skills.description: Analyze revenue performance and trends across different time periods and revenue streams.
examples: Show me our revenue trends for the last quarter
Analyze subscription revenue performance for the past 6 months

skills.name: Get KPI Dashboard
skills.description: Generate comprehensive KPI dashboards for specific departments or company-wide metrics.
examples: Generate a KPI dashboard for the sales department
Show me marketing performance metrics with industry benchmarks

skills.name: Forecast Business Metrics
skills.description: Forecast key business metrics including revenue, customer growth, and market expansion.
examples: Forecast our business metrics for the next 6 months
Predict revenue growth for the coming year

skills.name: Analyze Customer Segments
skills.description: Analyze customer segment performance, behavior patterns, and churn predictions.
examples: Analyze our customer segments and churn patterns
Show enterprise customer performance with retention analysis
